include ("${EXTERNALS_LIB_LOCATION}/CMake-Register_External_Lib.txt")

set (VJSON_ARCHIVE "${VJSON_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/libvjson.a")

register_external_lib (libvjson ${VJSON_BUILTIN_LOCATION} ${VJSON_ARCHIVE})

set (CMAKE_C_FLAGS "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -I${VJSON_BUILTIN_LOCATION}")
set (CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -I${VJSON_BUILTIN_LOCATION}")
